The Lord of the Rings (film series)

wikitext.*:
{{stub}}
{{disambig-more|Weta|[[Weta (disambiguation)]]}}
[[Image:Weta Fx logo.jpg|thumb|175px|right|Current logo of Wētā FX]] 

'''Wētā FX''', formerly known as '''Weta Digital''', is a digital visual effects company that created all of the special effects for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]] and [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]].It has also co-created special effects for the series [[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]] alongside others visual effects company such us [[wikipedia:Industrial Light & Magic|Industrial Light & Magic]] (ILM) and [[wikipedia:DNEG|DNEG]]. It was founded by [[Peter Jackson]], [[Richard Taylor]], and Jamie Selkirk in [[1993]], and it is based in Wellington, [[New Zealand]]. 

In November 2021, the company was sold to video games software company Unity Technologies for US$1.625 billion.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://deadline.com/2021/11/weta-digital-sold-unity-peter-jackson-1234870996/|articlename=Peter Jackson Selling Weta Digital’s VFX Tech Division To Unity For $1.625 Billion|dated=9 November 2021|website=[https://deadline.com/ Deadline]|accessed=19 October 2022}}</ref> The acquisition was completed the following month in December 2021.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.awn.com/news/its-done-unity-completes-weta-digital-acquisition|articlename=It’s Done: Unity Completes Weta Digital Acquisition|dated=2 December 2021|website=[https://www.awn.com/ Awn]|accessed=19 October 2022}}</ref>

== Awards ==
[[Image:Weta Digital - logo.gif|thumb|right|Previous logo of Wētā FX, as Weta Digital]]
To date, Wētā FX has won six Academy Awards for Best Visual Effects: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (2001), The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (2002), The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (2003), King Kong (2005), Avatar (2009) and The Jungle Book (2016).

=== Peter Jackson's ''The Middle-earth Saga'' ===
==== ''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' ====
* Academy Award® for Best Visual Effects: Academy of Motion Pictures, Arts and Sciences
* BAFTA for Best Visual Effects: British Academy of Film and Television Arts
* Satellite Award for Best Visual Effects

==== ''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' ====
* Academy Award® for Best Visual Effects: Academy of Motion Pictures, Arts and Sciences
* BAFTA for Best Visual Effects: British Academy of Film and Television Arts
* Visual Effects Society Award for Best Visual Effects in an Effects Driven Motion Picture
* Visual Effects Society Award for Best Character Animation in a Live Action Motion Picture
* Visual Effects Society Award for Best Special Effects in a Motion Picture
* Visual Effects Society Award for Best Models and Miniatures in a Motion Picture
* Visual Effects Society Award for Best Visual Effects Photography in a Motion Picture
* Visual Effects Society Award for Best Effects Art Direction in a Motion Picture
* Visual Effects Society Award for Best Compositing in a Motion Picture
* Visual Effects Society Award for Best Performance by an Actor in an Effects Film

==== ''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' ====
* Academy Award® for Best Visual Effects: Academy of Motion Pictures, Arts and Sciences
* Technical Achievement Award for Gollum: Academy of Motion Pictures, Arts and Sciences
* BAFTA for Best Visual Effects: British Academy of Film and Television Arts
* Visual Effects Society Award for Outstanding Visual Effects in a Visual Effects Driven Motion Picture
* Visual Effects Society Award for Outstanding Models and Miniatures in a Motion Picture
* Visual Effects Society Award for Outstanding Character Animation in a Live Action Motion Picture      
* Visual Effects Society Award for Outstanding Performance by a Male or Female Actor in an Effects Film

==== ''The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey'' ====
* Academy Award® - Academy Scientific and Technical Award: Academy of Motion Pictures, Arts and Sciences
* AEAF Awards for Feature Film - Visual Effects 
* Visual Effects Society Award for Outstanding Virtual Cinematography in a Live Action Feature Motion Picture
* Annie Award for Outstanding Achievement in Character Animation in a Live Action Production:International Animated Film Society

==== ''The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug'' ====
* Visual Effects Society Award for Outstanding Animated Character in a Live Action Feature Motion Picture

=== Amazon Studios's ''The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power'' ===
==== ''The Rings of Power'' - Season One ====
* Visual Effects Society Award for Outstanding Visual Effects in a Photoreal Episode (for "[[Udûn (episode)|Udûn]]")
* Visual Effects Society Award for Outstanding Created Environment in an Episode, Commercial, or Real-Time Project (for Volcano Destruction in "[[Adar (episode)|Adar]]")
* Visual Effects Society Award for Outstanding Effects Simulations in an Episode, Commercial, or Real-Time Project (for Númenor City in "Udûn")
